RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 1 1M Dirt CR: 76. Claiming Purse 12200. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES SINCE AUGUST 23, 2022. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since July 23 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race Since June 23 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: GRAY ROYALITY pressed the pace two wide, gained a narrow lead at the top of the stretch and drew off late under right handed urging. CALENDULA set a pressured pace along the inside into the stretch then was no match for the winner. OPULENT WAYS stalked the pace and failed to respond. GALILEO'S AFFAIR was restless in the gate then outrun. MANHATTAN LADY was through after a half. FLYING BUSINESS close up for half, stopped in the stretch.

ENTRY.NAME: Calendula
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pressured pace inside, no match for winner,

ENTRY.NAME: Opulent Ways
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, failed to respond,

ENTRY.NAME: Manhattan Lady
ENTRY.COMMENT: through after half,

ENTRY.NAME: Flying Business
ENTRY.COMMENT: close half, stopped,

ENTRY.NAME: Galileo's Affair
ENTRY.COMMENT: restless gate, outrun,

ENTRY.NAME: Gray Royality
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 2 wide, perfect trip, drew off, right urging

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 2 6F Dirt CR: 53. Maiden Claiming Purse 13100. FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $7,500 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: KRISTIN away alertly, set all the pace and widened through the stretch under right handed urging to win as much the best. SOLDAT TEMPTATION unhurried early, swung wide and rallied for second in the seven path. IMA SURE BET offered a mild bid in the five path into the stretch then failed to sustain that bid. SAUNTER vied for the lead two wide into the stretch and weakened late. EVIL MATTERS hesitated at the start, rushed to contention widest of all, had speed through the turn then was used up. DIMPLED was a sharp early threat three wide and through after a half. SWAMP WITCH HADDY was through early.

ENTRY.NAME: Soldat Temptation
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried early, swung wide, late rally, second best, 7path

ENTRY.NAME: Evil Matters
ENTRY.COMMENT: hesitated start, rushed wide, used up,

ENTRY.NAME: Kristin
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set pace, drew off, right handed urging, much best

ENTRY.NAME: Swamp Witch Haddy
ENTRY.COMMENT: through early,

ENTRY.NAME: Saunter
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied for lead, 2 wide, weakened late

ENTRY.NAME: Ima Sure Bet
ENTRY.COMMENT: middle move, 5path, failed to sustain bid,

ENTRY.NAME: Dimpled
ENTRY.COMMENT: speed 3 wide, through after half,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 3 6F Dirt CR: 83. Allowance Purse 38400. FOR REGISTERED OHIO FOALS THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since July 23 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since June 23 Allowed 4 lbs. (Claiming Races For $12,500 OrLess Not Considered In Weight Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: HEY EUGENE dueled for the lead along the inside down the backstretch, shook clear entering the turn, turned back a strong bid from the runner up nearing the quarter pole and drew off under mild right handed urging to win going away. WETZEL had speed from the start while hung five wide, loomed boldly two wide at the quarter pole then was no match for the winner. K KID pressed the early pace four wide and faded three wide in the stretch. TIER ONE trailed into the turn and passed tiring rivals two wide. A PRAYER FOR KIDS improved position along the inside into the stretch then weakened. LONE BOY was hustled from the gate to battle for the lead two wide down the backstretch and stopped on the turn.

ENTRY.NAME: Hey Eugene
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled inside, shook clear turn, full of run, going away

ENTRY.NAME: Lone Boy
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled along, dueled 2 wide, stopped turn,

ENTRY.NAME: A Prayer for Kids
ENTRY.COMMENT: improved position inside top lane, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: K Kid
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed 4w, faded, 3 wide,

ENTRY.NAME: Wetzel
ENTRY.OWNER: Pickerrell William D Pickerrell Joe and Cline Robert C
ENTRY.COMMENT: good early speed, loomed boldly 2 wide 1/4 pole, no match

ENTRY.NAME: Tier One
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed, passed tiring rivals, 2 wide,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 4 1M Dirt CR: 73. Allowance Purse 28000. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since July 23 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race Since June 23 Allowed 4 lbs. (Claiming Races For $12,500 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances) (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ALSANAH saved ground into the stretch, shifted three wide before the furlong marker, split foes, was bumped and got up in time. MAGIC PALACE chased the pace the entire trip, dug in gamely four wide and gained second. SICILIAN STYLE TWO set the pace to the top of the stretch, was headed, drifted bumping rivals then outfinished two wide. JACK'S YACHT QUEEN allowed to settle, rallied along the rail to make the lead in upper stretch, was bumped past the furlong marker and outfinished. CANDYMONIUM failed to menace. MY D'VALENTINE was through after half, stopped and was eased to the wire. SURPRISED GEM stopped on the backstretch, pulled up in the stretch and was walked off.

ENTRY.NAME: Sicilian Style Two
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace, headed top lane, drifted, bumped rivals, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: Jack's Yacht Queen
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, rallied rail, bumped, led, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: Candymonium
ENTRY.COMMENT: failed to menace,

ENTRY.NAME: Magic Palace
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased, dug in 4 wide, gained second

ENTRY.NAME: Surprised Gem
ENTRY.COMMENT: stopped backstretch, pulled up, walked off

ENTRY.NAME: Alsanah
ENTRY.COMMENT: inside, shifted 3w, upper stretch, split foes, bumped, in time

ENTRY.NAME: My d'Valentine
ENTRY.COMMENT: through after half, stopped, eased to wire

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 5 6F Dirt CR: 58. Maiden Special Weight Purse 26400. FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: COROMANDEL prompted the pace two wide for a half, responded with a quick move to make the lead in upper stretch and drew clear under left handed urging. FULL TIME STRUTIN stalked pace into the stretch, rallied three wide and finished clear for second. VIMISOFA away alertly, set a pressured pace along the inside to the top of the stretch then was outfinished. CATCHMENOW failed to menace. SHEWEARSMYRING was fractious in the gate and always oturun. LA KADENZA was no factor.

ENTRY.NAME: Shewearsmyring
ENTRY.COMMENT: fractious in gate, outrun,

ENTRY.NAME: La Kadenza
ENTRY.COMMENT: no factor,

ENTRY.NAME: Full Time Strutin
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, rallied 3 wide, clear second

ENTRY.NAME: Catchmenow
ENTRY.COMMENT: failed to menace,

ENTRY.NAME: Vimisofa
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set pressured pace, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: Coromandel
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 2 wide, quick move, perfect trip, driving,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 6 1M Dirt CR: 60. Allowance Purse 35800. FOR ACCREDITED OHIO FOALS FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON A RACE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, OPTIONAL, OR STARTER OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since July 23 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race Since June 23 Allowed 4 lbs. (Claiming Races For $12,500 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BEAUTIFUL LASS sprinted to a daylight lead soon after the start, set all the pace, drifted out in upper stretch to the six path under right handed urging and prevailed under a strong hand ride. RATATAT stalked the pace early, offered a mild bid two wide passing the quarter pole, altered course inside the winner near mid stretch and finished second best. LADY ITCH chased the winner near the inside into the stretch then faded. WELLOILEDCAT trailed into the far turn then passed tiring rivals. MANDOLIN BREEZE allowed to settle, moved closer in the four path on the far turn then came up empty. CRIMSON LEGION hopped at the start and had brief speed inside. THE RIDER OF RATATAT LODGED A CLAIM OF FOUL AGAINST THE RIDER OF THE WINNER FOR ALLEGED INTERFERENCE IN THE STRETCH. AFTER REVIEW THE STEWARDS UPHELD THE ORIGINAL ORDER OF FINISH.

ENTRY.NAME: Beautiful Lass
ENTRY.COMMENT: sprinted clear, set pace, drifted out top lane, driving,

ENTRY.NAME: Crimson Legion
ENTRY.COMMENT: hopped start, brief speed, inside,

ENTRY.NAME: Welloiledcat
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed, passed tiring rivals,

ENTRY.NAME: Lady Itch
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased inside, faded lane

ENTRY.NAME: Mandolin Breeze
ENTRY.OWNER: Emerson Equistions LLC and Bestard Brian
ENTRY.COMMENT: middle move, 4path, empty,

ENTRY.NAME: Ratatat
ENTRY.COMMENT: bid 2 wide 1/4p, altered inside winner 1/8pole, claimed foul

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 7 6F Dirt CR: 82. Allowance Purse 28000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON A RACE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER, OPTIONAL OR OHIO BRED. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since July 23 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since June 23 Allowed 4 lbs. (Ohi o Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: VENETIAN DREAM dueled for the lead along the inside, drifted out late when put to right handed urging bumping the runner up and prevailed under strong handling. O CIGANO battled with the winner two wide,, was bumped by that one inside the sixteenth pole and finished clear for second. SUSIE'S KID raced outside and had a mild late rally. GARRETT went evenly. RUMBLE STRIP RON well placed, failed to respond. THE RIDER OF O CIGANO LODGED A CLAIM OF FOUL AGAINST THE RIDER OF THE WINNER FOR ALLEGED INTERFERENCE IN THE STRETCH. AFTER REVIEW THE STEWARDS TOOK NO ACTION.

ENTRY.NAME: Garrett
ENTRY.COMMENT: evenly,

ENTRY.NAME: Venetian Dream
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled inside, drifted out left urging, bumped, all out,

ENTRY.NAME: O Cigano
ENTRY.OWNER: Urieta Racing Stable and Quinteros Delia
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled 2 wide, bumped late, clear second, jockey claimed foul,

ENTRY.NAME: Susie's Kid
ENTRY.COMMENT: outside trip, mild rally late

ENTRY.NAME: Rumble Strip Ron
ENTRY.COMMENT: well placed, failed to respond,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 8 6F Dirt CR: 71. Maiden Special Weight Purse 26400. FOR MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: FALK was bumped hard between horses at the start, shifted out side, rallied three wide through the turn, made the lead past the quarter pole and drew off to win as much the best. STREET TRAFFIC dueled for the lead along the inside and was no match for winner. MOTOWN COLLECTION battled for the lead lead two wide into the turn and faded in the stretch. TWELVE MINUS ONE bore out at the start bumping hard with rivals, had good early speed and was through after a half. EL BURRITO was bumped hard between rivals and squeezed at the start then no factor. SECOND LIEUTENANT bore in bumping rivals at the start and was through early. THE STEWARDS POSTED THE INQUIRY SIGN BUT TOOK NO ACTION.

ENTRY.NAME: Twelve Minus One
ENTRY.COMMENT: bore out, bumped hard start, good early speed, through after half

ENTRY.NAME: El Burrito
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped hard, squeezed start, no factor,

ENTRY.NAME: Falk
ENTRY.OWNER: Blazing Meadows Farm LLC and Hertrich III Frederick
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped hard between horses start, rallied 3w, much the best,

ENTRY.NAME: Second Lieutenant
ENTRY.COMMENT: bore in, bumped hard start, through early,

ENTRY.NAME: Street Traffic
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed inside, led, no match for winner,

ENTRY.NAME: Motown Collection
ENTRY.COMMENT: battled early, faded lane
